# Tajaran
Tajara are a species of omnivorous, bipedal humanoids with features strongly resembling Terran felines. Their most distinguishing traits include a layer of fur, large ears atop their heads, and a tail that aids in balance.
## Mechanics
Due to their [color=yellow]small stature[/color], Tajara [color=#ec3a3a]take 15% more Brute damage[/color], but they can also [color=#1e90ff]fit into duffel bags[/color].
Their layer of fur gives them some [color=#1e90ff]resistance to Cold[/color], at the cost of [color=#ec3a3a]taking more Heat damage[/color]
They use their claws for unarmed attacks, dealing [color=#ec3a3a]Slashing[/color] and [color=#ec3a3a]Piercing[/color] damage.
Thanks to their innate agility, they [color=#1e90ff]take reduced damage from impacts or falls[/color], and their soft feet allow them to [color=#1e90ff]walk shoeless without making noise[/color].
## Lore
The Tajaran, hailing from their icy origin world of Ahdomai, have a long history of civil wars amongst different local clans, with many escaping into space to avoid endless strife. The first known expedition from Ahdomai was led by a now defunct genetics company, which coincidentally developed the Felinid species...
